items.sentence: Tom gave me three reasons why he couldn\'t help.
Why don\'t you stay and drink some wine with us?
Tom wasn\'t surprised who showed up to meet him.
It\'s unlikely Tom understands what\'s going on.
What was the name of that tune you were playing?
What would you do if Tom ever learned the truth?
Tom certainly made no attempt to stop the fight.
I think Tom is too old to be dating my daughter.
I don\'t know if it was Tom who did that or not.
Mary is probably going to tell Tom she\'s tired.
I want Tom to forgive Mary for what she\'s done.
Tom wasn\'t the only one who wasn\'t helping us.
Tom didn\'t plan on running into anyone he knew.
Tom didn\'t realize he had to help Mary do that.
Tom didn\'t really feel like eating Korean food.
Tom didn\'t see any familiar faces at the party.
Tom doesn\'t know Mary has spent time in prison.
Tom seems to be waiting for something to happen.
I think it\'s unlikely that Tom will marry Mary.
I think it\'s unlikely that Tom would ever move.
